meanings.definition: A unit of currency in Iran, equal to ten rials.
meanings.sent1: In Iran, people use tomans to buy goods and services.
meanings.sent2: I exchanged my rials for tomans at the currency exchange.
meanings.sent3: The vending machine only accepted tomans, so I had to find a way to get some.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was worth a thousand tomans, brightening up the room instantly.
meanings.sent5: The sound of tomans jingling in his pocket was music to his ears.

meanings.definition: The plural form of the word 'toman'.
meanings.sent1: She counted her savings and found a few tomans among the coins.
meanings.sent2: The shopkeeper priced the items in tomans for the convenience of the customers.
meanings.sent3: The children played with toy tomans, pretending they were treasure hunters.
meanings.sent4: The field was covered in a blanket of colorful tomans, creating a mesmerizing sight.
meanings.sent5: The bag was heavy with the weight of countless tomans, a symbol of hard work and savings.
